name: BlueConnect
0:
”Alexa, ask blue connect the water temperature”
”Alexa, ask blue connect how is my pool going”
”Alexa, ask blue connect the last measurement”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: blue connect
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Blue Connect, the smart pool analyzer, its mobile app and Alexa skill help you to look after your pool 24/7, even if you are away.

Thanks to the Blue Connect skill, Alexa can tell your swimming pool water parameters (temperature, pH, ORP, conductivity, salinity) as well as required maintenance action.

The Blue Connect skill is intended for users of the Blue Connect and Blue by Riiot analyzers.

For more information on Blue Connect: https://www.blueconnect.io
